content:
I just narrowed to #announce stream and although the message having my pointer was sent on October 6, the floating recipient bar was showing 5th Oct which was confusing. I think we should update the floating recipient bar info according to the position of the pointer.
anim.gif
(considering that we have an open issue to remove the dates from the separator, I think we could consider this as part of that issue)
@Harshit Bansal hmm, interesting feedback. The current model is that the floating recipient bar shows the date that would appear on the recipient bar of the message it's covering over.
I think that's the right model for what that should show.
However, I think this is a sign that we should improve our date-dividers to work better, since I'd argue the real problem here is that you didn't notice the divider.

Hmm, yeah. One yardstick might be that the dates in the dividers should be no less conspicuous than the ones in the recipient bars. Currently they're rather lighter and I think that makes them easier to miss.
